paragraphs.content: A Psalm or Song for the sons of Korah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Psalm or Song for the sons of Korah.

paragraphs.content: His foundation is in the holy mountains.
paragraphs.contentHtml: His foundation is in the holy mountains.

paragraphs.content: The LORD loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.

paragraphs.content: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.

paragraphs.content: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this man was born there.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this man was born there.

paragraphs.content: And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.

paragraphs.content: The LORD shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.

paragraphs.content: As well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there: all my springs are in thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there: all my springs are in thee.
